alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 09 at 2:58PM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bennington County. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Some power outages are possible as a result of the heavy wet snow and gusty winds. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to a heavy, wet snow late Sunday night and continue into Monday afternoon. The weight of the snow could lead to downed trees and power lines resulting in some power outages. The higher amounts will occur at elevations above 1500 feet.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
